reviews.review_msg: Pros: Nice guy, Very knowledgeable, doesn't make you feel bad about asking questions. Inspiring lectures. Cons: Grading feedback takes longer than usual. Sometimes unclear grading criteria. Note: Tests underline major themes of the course. Projects are extremely time consuming if you don't know what you're doing. Ask for help if you want an A.

The only thing I don't like about him is that he never returned the assignments to us and did not tell us the marks/grades. You have to wait till the end of the semester and check it on SIS.  Otherwise nice prof.
